description1: I am a Junior Front End Designer in training with over 10 years of experience as a Desktop Publisher in an international translation agency. During this time, I have built a versatile profile that combines expertise in design tools (InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch) with key soft skills such as organization, teamwork, leadership, problem-solving, and daily communication in English in high-pressure environments.
description2: In 2025, I decided to take a new direction in my career and enrolled in an intensive web development bootcamp, where I gained knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SCSS, React, MySQL, APIs, Express, and agile methodologies (Scrum). Front End development is now the area where I want to grow professionally, merging my design background with my new technical skills to create digital projects that are creative, functional, and user-centered.
experience-details-tpt: Adaptation of Graphic Design projects into multiple languages where the source format is Adobe InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, XD, Figma, Sketch, Microsoft Word, or PowerPoint.
Team organization and workflow coordination to ensure timely and high-quality project deliveries.
Training sessions for Project Managers to optimize collaboration with the DTP team and align on project priorities.
Training and mentoring of new hires and colleagues on DTP workflows and specialized software tools.
Direct collaboration with Project Managers to define the most effective approach for each project.
Autonomous management of individual projects, ensuring accountability and efficiency.
Strong problem-solving skills applied to technical, organizational, and design-related challenges.
experience-details-V3: Creation of design pieesCreación de piezas gráficas para cursa deportiva
Modificación de código HTML y CSS en Wordpress
experience-details-Mutua: Assistir a l'adaptació of Graphic Design projects...
